description: Episode of Series "Phaidon art collection". Narrated by Diana Quick and featuring a collage of fashion images, drawings and archive footage of the late Gabrielle Chanel herself, this is a fascinating documentary about an extraordinary woman and the house of fashion that she created. From her sportswear of the 1920's through to the creation infamous Chanel suit in the 50's, this film gives a broad overview of her life and examines the reasons why Chanel has become one of the greatest names in fashion. Also features interviews with Karl Lagerfeld.
